create:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS WATCHER(
              watcher_id VARCHAR PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT (hex( randomblob(16))),
              owner_group_id VARCHAR,
source VARCHAR,
poll_config VARCHAR,
              FOREIGN KEY(owner_group_id) REFERENCES OWNER_GROUP(owner_group_id) 
            )
updateSingle:
UPDATE WATCHER SET
            owner_group_id=@owner_group_id,
source=@source,
poll_config=@poll_config
            WHERE watcher_id=@watcher_id
countAll: SELECT COUNT(*) as records FROM WATCHER
countBYowner_group_id:
SELECT COUNT(*) as records FROM WATCHER 
          WHERE owner_group_id=@owner_group_id
